subject: Movies
Concussions
Football
Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy
lead_paragraph: Relatives of Duerson accused the movie of making up encounters that portrayed him as a villain, but the director said “Concussion” was “spiritually accurate.”
snippet: Relatives of Duerson accused the movie of making up encounters that portrayed him as a villain, but the director said “Concussion” was “spiritually accurate.”
